description: Your order, wherever you are. Your comfort is our priority, and our speed is our advantage
start_message:
Start your journey with Twsil in one step
With Twsil, everything is closer to you
start_journey: Start your journey with Twsil in one step
closer_with_twsil: With Twsil. Everything is closer to you
verification_sent: Verification code has been sent to :
wait_before_requesting_again: Please wait before requesting another code
forgot_password_msg: Please choose your account type to reset your password
To_Num: The code will be sent to the number
To_Email: The code will be sent to the email
error_camera_access: Could not access camera. Please check permissions.
error_gallery_access: Could not access gallery. Please check permissions.
error_file_access: Could not access files. Please try again.
phone_invalid: Please enter a valid 8-digit phone number starting with 2, 3, or 4

wrong_account_type: No account found with this information
driver_not_found: No driver account found with this information
client_not_found: No client account found with this information

account_not_found: No account found with this information
account_inactive: Account is inactive, please contact support
try_again: An error occurred, please try again
unknown_error: Unknown error occurred, please try again later
driver_description: Join our delivery team, be part of our network, and earn extra income with a flexible schedule
invalid_otp_code: Invalid verification code, please try again
otp_failed: Failed to send verification code, please try again
failed_to_send_otp: Failed to send verification code, please try again
otp_expired: OTP expired, please request a new one
otp_used: This code has already been used, please request a new one
otp_blocked: This code has been blocked, please request a new one
no_active_otp: No active code found, please request a new one
system_error: System error, please try again later
user_not_found: No account found with this information, please check your details
user_id_not_available: Could not retrieve user ID, please try again
password_reset_failed: Failed to reset password, please try again
emergency_desc: If you are facing an emergency situation, you can contact emergency services or send an SOS alert to our support team.
check_email_for_code: Check your email for the code
check_phone_for_code: Check your phone for the code
verification_sent_phone: Verification code sent to your phone
verification_sent_email: Verification code sent to your email
driver_registration_thank_you_message: Your request has been received successfully. We will review your information and activate your account upon approval. Thank you for joining our team!
account_review_message: We will review your information and activate your account upon approval. Thank you for waiting.
account_restricted_message: Your account has been temporarily restricted due to:
client_account_restricted_message: Your account has been restricted due to violating the terms of use. If you think otherwise, please contact technical support.
app_instructions_chauffeur: As a driver, your main job is to provide safe and comfortable transportation for customers.
app_instructions_livreur: As a delivery person, your main job is to deliver packages and orders to customers quickly and safely.
app_instructions_deal_customers: Always communicate politely with customers and verify details before starting.
app_instructions_rights: To ensure your rights and the customer's, never accept cash outside the app and always follow app procedures.
app_instructions_scan_qr: At the end of each ride or delivery, you must scan the QR code from the customer's phone to confirm completion.
error_occurred: An error occurred while updating status
